style_guide.visual_style: Bright, friendly flat illustration style with soft pastel colors (coral pink, mint green, butter yellow, sky blue). Clean, modern Korean cafe aesthetic with playful hand-drawn elements. Warm and inviting mood with a cheerful, optimistic energy. Think cute Korean stationery meets contemporary design.
style_guide.segment_story: Two people meet for the first time and go through the natural flow of getting to know each other - exchanging names, ages, and interests. The conversation builds from polite introductions to genuine compliments and shared interests, culminating in an invitation to become friends over coffee. It's the sweet, hopeful moment when strangers realize they could become friends.

images.prompt_used: Close-up shot, two young Korean adults facing each other with warm, curious smiles and gentle eye contact, one person with a friendly hand gesture near their chest in a self-introduction pose, the other leaning in attentively with open body language, soft morning light streaming through a cafe window, coral pink and mint green cafe interior blurred in background, both wearing casual modern clothing in pastel tones, expressions showing nervous excitement and hopefulness of a first meeting, butter yellow glow creating intimate welcoming atmosphere, clean minimalist Korean cafe aesthetic, illustrated in bright friendly flat illustration style with soft edges and warm inviting color palette
